name: Argument Simulator
description:
It was a bright sunny day until a misunderstanding happened. Can you save your relationship from breaking?

In an argument, you have to say the right thing at the right time. This game will test your reflexes. 

Controls: Space/Click/Tap screen to stop the slider. Hitting outside the green makes you hurt her.

If you reach +5 Affection, the Argument is resolved. If you reach -5 Affection, you break up.
